org.springframework.boot.autoconfigure.data.mongo

类 MongoDataAutoConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.boot.autoconfigure.data.mongo.MongoDataAutoConfiguration

  • @Configuration
 @ConditionalOnClass(value={<error>,<error>})
 @EnableConfigurationProperties(value=MongoProperties.class)
 @AutoConfigureAfter(value=MongoAutoConfiguration.class)
public class MongoDataAutoConfiguration
extends Object
    Auto-configuration for Spring Data's mongo support.

    Registers a MongoTemplate and GridFsTemplate beans if no other beans of the same type are configured.

    Honors the spring.data.mongodb.database property if set, otherwise connects to the test database.

    从以下版本开始:
    1.1.0
